__e: You worked for our separation with your anger and jealousy and your love.
You saw that guy fucking her like an expert, it made you crazy, so you killed her.
Then Scott found out about it and he told me tonight, he told me she was not right... she was sick inside... sick with jealousy... and that is why she killed him.
He's jealous again. We must give him something concrete.
You mustn't be, jealousy is a horrid sentiment, worthy of neither your spirit nor your beauty.
To understand this world, understand that for him, jealousy is never even felt. - Monsters!
I can't deal with that jealous crap.
It's not jealousy on my part.
Or that God can be jealous or bloodthirsty or vengeful.
